concept.title: What is Subtraction?
concept.shortdesc: To explain what it is that you are doing when you use the JPS subtraction feature.

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of subtracting numbers, you should know what subtraction is. "Subtraction" is a mathematical concept in which you find the difference between two numbers.
So, the purpose of subtraction is to reduce a number into it's smaller form. We take one number away from the other.
The minus (-) symbol represents subtraction of numbers.
This same symbol is used in the app to represent subtraction; therefore, it will complete the task of subtracting numbers.
